content.html: So it’s Pi Day today. A ridiculous day if you ask me, not because I don’t like pi, but because the date format MM/DD is simply wrong. Pi day should be celebrated on the 31st April instead, that’s when you’ll find me celebrating all the maths and not any time sooner.
content.value:
So it’s Pi Day today. A ridiculous day if you ask me, not because I don’t like pi, but because the date format MM/DD is simply wrong.

Pi day should be celebrated on the 31st April instead, that’s when you’ll find me celebrating all the maths and not any time sooner.
